featured.text: But without that activity, blood sugar levels and blood pressure keep creeping up, steadily damaging the inside of the arteries and increasing the risk of diabetes, heart disease, stroke, and other serious diseases.

definition.zh_def: 糖尿病是一種影響身體如何使用葡萄糖的慢性疾病。
definition.en_def: Diabetes is a chronic disease that affects how the body uses glucose.
definition.example: She was diagnosed with diabetes and needs to manage her diet carefully.
